data: Ki-pún hun-sek, chhī-tiûⁿ sim-chêng hun-sek, kap hong-hiám hun-sek
Le̍k-sú chhī-tiûⁿ chu-liāu, jîn-lūi kau-hō͘ hoê-khiok, kap bô͘-cho͘-hòa AI goân-kiāⁿ
Tēng-liōng kau-e̍k, tâu-chu cho͘-ha̍p koán-lí, kap hong-hiám phêng-kó͘
Kripto Hòe-pè kau-e̍k chu-liāu, Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), kap Solana (SOL)
Kó͘-phiò kau-e̍k kap tâu-chu cho͘-ha̍p koán-lí
Le̍k-sú kó͘-phiò kè-siàu, sin-bûn bûn-chiuⁿ, siā-kau mûi-thé hoat-bûn, kap êng-lī pò-kò
Tēng-liōng Kó͘-phiò Tâu-chu kap Tâu-chu Cho͘-ha̍p Koán-lí
Le̍k-sú kó͘-phiò kè-siàu, kim-iông pò-kò, hông-koan keng-chè chí-piau, chèng-chhek piàn-tōng, chhī-tiûⁿ sim-chêng chu-liāu, kap kau-e̍k kì-lo̍k
Chin-si̍t kau-e̍k kì-lo̍k (Xueqiu), Guba Lūn-toâⁿ hoat-bûn, Sina & CNINFO sin-bûn, kap SSE 50 kó͘-phiò chu-liāu
Tâu-chu-chiá hêng-ûi bô͘-gí tī kó͘-chhī khoân-kéng
Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4o, Grok-2, Mistral Large 24.11, GPT-3.5, and Gemini 1.5 Pro
